quoteText:
You agree that TunnelBear, in its sole discretion, for any or no reason, and without penalty, may terminate or suspend your use of the Service at any time.
TunnelBear may also in its sole discretion and at any time discontinue the Services in their entirety, or any part thereof, with or without notice.
title: TunnelBear can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: The terms of service state that "TunnelBear […] may terminate or suspend your use of the Service at any time" and that it "may also […] discontinue the Services in their entirety […] with or without notice".
